meanings.definition: To arrange to receive something regularly, typically a publication or service.
meanings.sent1: She subscribes to a monthly magazine for entertainment.
meanings.sent2: He subscribes to a daily newspaper to stay informed.
meanings.sent3: The cat subscribes to the idea of napping all day.
meanings.sent4: Her heart subscribes to the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent5: The plant subscribes to the sunlight for growth.

meanings.definition: To express agreement with an idea or belief.
meanings.sent1: He subscribes to the notion of kindness towards others.
meanings.sent2: She subscribes to the theory of working together for success.
meanings.sent3: The dog subscribes to the idea of treats for good behavior.
meanings.sent4: Their minds subscribe to the concept of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The student subscribes to the importance of education.

meanings.definition: To contribute money to a cause or organization.
meanings.sent1: They subscribe to a charity to support children in need.
meanings.sent2: She subscribes to a fundraiser for environmental conservation.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel subscribes to the idea of saving acorns for winter.
meanings.sent4: His generosity subscribes to helping those less fortunate.
meanings.sent5: The community subscribes to building a better future for all.
